content: आलीढ {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [आ-लिह् क्त] {@--1@} Licked, eaten, lapped, scraped. {@--2@} Wounded, hurt; सेनान्यमालीढमिवासुरास्त्रैः <ls>R. 2. 37.</ls> {@--3@} Closed (as in sleep) <ls>Dk. 117.</ls> --ढं A particular attitude in shooting, the right knee being advanced and the left leg retracted; अतिष्ठदालीढविशेषशोभिना <ls>R. 3. 52</ls>; see <ls>Malli.</ls> on <ls>Ku. 3. 70.</ls>
